description: Add pronoun placeholder support to Outcome and Personalized Comments, and enable pronoun selection in Final Comments UI

complexity.reasoning: Small feature scope with 4 user stories, 1-2 weeks effort, single developer, extends existing API (pronounId already in schema), no data migrations, integrates with existing pronoun endpoints

businessValue.impact: Enables personalization of comments using student pronouns - improves inclusivity and cultural sensitivity in student feedback
businessValue.userBenefit: Teachers can use gender-neutral or preferred pronouns when writing comments, making feedback more respectful and personalized

completionRequirements: Placeholders {{pronoun}} and {{possessivePronoun}} documented for Outcome Comments
Placeholders {{pronoun}} and {{possessivePronoun}} documented for Personalized Comments
Pronoun dropdown implemented in Final Comment form
Pronoun selection persists when saving Final Comment
